participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Curious and adventurous, always looking for new experiences.
participant_1.background: I enjoy watching videos on youtube. I have a small beagle dog who I call Droopy. I love eating shrimp, and I like to dip them into barbecue sauce. I use third party programs to read portable documents instead of Adobe.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Energetic and outgoing, with a passion for outdoor activities.
participant_2.background: I love to climb. I am the oldest of 5 children. I love my parrot, Todd. I've never been to the beach.

content.text: Hello! What are you interested in?
I love to climb! I have been climbing since I was a kid, and I love the feeling of being on the top of a mountain.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I've never been climbing before, but I've always wanted to try it.
You should! It's a great way to get exercise and see some beautiful views.
I think I will! I'll have to look into some local climbing gyms.
That's great! I'm sure you'll love it.
What else do you like to do?
I also love my parrot, Todd. He's a very funny bird, and he always makes me laugh.
I love parrots! They're so smart and expressive.
Todd is the smartest bird I've ever met. He can talk, he can whistle, and he can even do some tricks.
That's amazing! I've never seen a parrot do tricks before.
He's a real showman. He loves to entertain people.
I'm sure he does. He sounds like a great pet.
He is! I'm so glad I have him in my life.
It sounds like you have a lot of fun hobbies.
I do! I love to stay active and I love being around animals.
That's great! I'm glad you're so happy.
Thanks! I'm glad to meet you, too.
